授業目的: SThe purpose of this course is for students to develop English listening, reading, speaking, and writing skills, in addition to learning new vocabulary, all while working in an all-English communicative atmosphere.
到達目標:
Students will be able to:
1. write brief reports on various topics.
2. deliver brief presentations on various topics.
3. learn and operate in an all-English classroom environment.
